project0.title: TripEZ
project0.brief: AngularJS-powered vacation plans organized by Trip, Base, and Event JSON objects in the Firebase Web API. Base and Event searches interact with Google Places API for saving places to eat, stay, and see. Styling with UI-Bootstrap in SASS.
project0.technologiesUsed: AngularJS, UI-Bootstrap, Firebase Database and Hosting, Sass, Material Design, Version Control with Github

project1.title: YFinder
project1.brief: Xamarin Forms/C# mobile app for students and professionals to find and rate their favorite hotspots to work and study. It uses iPhone's GPS and WiFi sensors to gauge location & connectivity. It is powered by my YFinder C#/NET Core 2.0 API.
project1.technologiesUsed: C#, Xamarin, Xamarin Forms, LINQ, Entity Framework

project2.title: A Juicy Project
project2.brief: Python/Javascript full stack project demoing use of Flask micro framework to call, clean, and display Nutritionix API results. Also used Bootstrap for tables and D3 for visualizations.
project2.technologiesUsed: AngularJS, UI-Bootstrap, Firebase Database and Hosting, Sass, Material Design, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Classfighter II
project3.brief: jQuery loaded SPA with AJAX calls querying user data from the Treehouse learning site. Pits users against each other and declares a winner along with animation of their badges.
project3.technologiesUsed: AngularJS, UI-Bootstrap, Firebase Database and Hosting, Sass, Material Design, Version Control with Github
